name: HUNTINGTON'S DISEASE SOCIETY OF AMERICA
sampleDescriptions: To create parity in the Medicare program for persons living with Huntingtons Disease.
Advancing Medicare coverage for persons living with Huntingtons Disease.
Advancing S. 1476 and HR 2770, the Huntingtons Disease Parity Act, which eliminates the two-year waiting period for Medicare eligibility for persons with HD who qualify for disability benefits.
